about_the_game:
Get ready to cook up a storm in "The Chef's Shift" - a fast-paced typing game set in a bustling restaurant! With your keyboard as your weapon, you'll need to cook and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers before they lose their patience. But that's not all - you'll also need to juggle all kinds of crazy distractions, from rat invasions to unruly customers.

In the demo, you can play through the first restaurant, with a total of 10 levels and experience a sneak peek of the Chinese restaurant. Cook up 13 different dishes from Italian cuisine and 2 dishes from the Chinese cuisine, and serve them to 6 different types of customers, each with their own attributes. Experience the first 30 minutes to an hour of the game with the demo!

  • 1 teaspoon of chaotic, fast-paced gameplay

  • 1 package of easy-to-pickup, hard-to-master TYPING mechanic

  • 1 cup of fun time management bits

And we mean it!

  • Navigate through the menu by typing

  • Prepare & serve your customers by typing

  • Select your dialogue choices by typing

Throughout the game you will meet various characters, from customers with their own personality, to characters who propel the story forward.

content_descriptors.notes:
The story is about mafia families and crime life. There will be frequent mention of criminal activity in the storyline like drugs, gang wars, illegal gambling etc.
The most violent thing shown is the display of gun and killing rats.

detailed_description:
Get ready to cook up a storm in "The Chef's Shift" - a fast-paced typing game set in a bustling restaurant! With your keyboard as your weapon, you'll need to cook and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers before they lose their patience. But that's not all - you'll also need to juggle all kinds of crazy distractions, from rat invasions to unruly customers.

In the demo, you can play through the first restaurant, with a total of 10 levels and experience a sneak peek of the Chinese restaurant. Cook up 13 different dishes from Italian cuisine and 2 dishes from the Chinese cuisine, and serve them to 6 different types of customers, each with their own attributes. Experience the first 30 minutes to an hour of the game with the demo!

  • 1 teaspoon of chaotic, fast-paced gameplay

  • 1 package of easy-to-pickup, hard-to-master TYPING mechanic

  • 1 cup of fun time management bits

And we mean it!

  • Navigate through the menu by typing

  • Prepare & serve your customers by typing

  • Select your dialogue choices by typing

Throughout the game you will meet various characters, from customers with their own personality, to characters who propel the story forward.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: The Chef's Shift Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM or better

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: The Chef’s Shift is a fast-paced typing game in a restaurant setting, where you’ll both cook & serve food to hungry customers, all done by TYPING. Play through the Italian restaurant and the beginning of the Chinese restaurant in the demo, and serve food to customers!
